title: Angry Salad - The Guinea Pig EP
description:
320KBPS

1. Did I Hurt You?
2. Given Up
3. I Want You Back
4. My Town
5. So Little
6. Dance
7. Rico

Bob Whelan - Lead Vocals
Alex Grossi - Lead Guitars
Brian Vesco - Bass
Hale Pulsifer - Drums

Angry Salad was a Boston band that gained massive popularity and were soon signed to Atlantic Records. However, a merger with Time Warner caused a large portion of bands to get dropped, with them, Angry Salad who in turn lost all rights to music and Moniker. The band got it's name from a Drunk Freddie Mercury during a cruise in the early 90's.
